title: Ronan
aboutGreeting:
Hey there, I'm Ronan Singpurwala!
I'm a developer based in Dublin, Ireland. I like building tools that make people's lives easier.

Experience: SRE @ Workday, Web Developer @ Skillko
Education: BSc in Computer Science (First Class Honours)
Skills: Python, Go, C, JavaScript, Java, Git, GNU/Linux, SQL, Docker, Grafana and more...
projects: A financial management and POS system for small businesses with multiple daily users.
A full stack GeoDjango PWA to help people find things to do in Dublin.
My silly food "blog" which people genuinely look at for recommendations.
